ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Ear
ThingDef.description: The advanced version of the bionic ear. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Eye
ThingDef.description: The advanced version of the bionic eye. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Arm
ThingDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Gives the owner incredible strength. You may destroy your opponents limbs in a fist fight...not recomended for wardens.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Leg
ThingDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Give the owner incredible speed

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Heart
ThingDef.description: A powerful cardiac augmentation, replacing standard human hearts. Safely manages very high blood flow without overwhelming standard body parts.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Lung
ThingDef.description: A powerful vascular augmentation, replacing standard human lungs. The perfect pairing with a cybernetic heart, this increases circulatory speed, increasing efficiency.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Kidney
ThingDef.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human kidneys. Increasing blood filtration efficiency.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Liver
ThingDef.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human livers. Increasing blood filtration efficiency and metabolic efficiency.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Stomach
ThingDef.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human stomachs. Increasing digestion efficiency and metabolic efficiency.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Hand
ThingDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of arm upgrades, just replacing hands.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Foot
ThingDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of leg upgrades, just replacing feet.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Jaw
ThingDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano machinery to break down food instantly with minimal effort.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic Bionic Spine
ThingDef.description: The most crucial part of the human body improved with the best available nano materials. Greatly imroved manipulation and movement.
